pullrequest.title: Fixed issue #31: analysis status not updating if no saved results

content.raw: Also it closes some merged branches from two recent pull requests. I'm not sure if this is my fault or not - I did the merges. I'll try to make sure I'm not doing merges that leave open branches, regardless of whether that requires action by me or by the pull request author, because it confuses mercurial majorly to have these merged but open branches around.
content.html: Also it closes some merged branches from two recent pull requests. I'm not sure if this is my fault or not - I did the merges. I'll try to make sure I'm not doing merges that leave open branches, regardless of whether that requires action by me or by the pull request author, because it confuses mercurial majorly to have these merged but open branches around.
